ygData.subject: Re: Carapace Boots
ygData.msgSnippet: Once I got there I started looking for a vendor who sold the beetle legs I would need. While in a tavern I was approached by a Dwarf who had a pair for sale.
ygData.messageBody:
Once I got there I started looking for a vendor who sold the beetle
legs I would need. While in a tavern I was approached by a Dwarf who
had a pair for sale. The price was reasonable, so I just bought them.

I got no response from the NPC by asking about boots, but I only
tried in passing since I still needed legs at that point. So, I have
the boots but never learned if I could get them from the NPC.

Barto of Rivervale

--- In EverQuest@y..., Jim Fullerton <jimbob@f...> wrote:
> i think you just ask him something like "what about boots" and he
tells you. he doesn't prompt you himself.
>
> MLockridge01@c... wrote:
>
> > I did the carapace breastplate and helmet quest in Kaladim. Later
I
> > read (on Alakazam) that there are carapace boots available from
the
> > same NPC in Kaladim. I got the parts and went to Kaladim but get
no
> > offer to make the boots from the NPC. Are the boots deactivated?
Does
> > anyone know this quest, and whether or not the boots can be had?
> >
> > Barto of Rivervale.
